sentences.en: Before I left Moscow, Putin hosted a small dinner in the Kremlin with a jazz concert afterward, featuring Russian musicians from teenagers to an octogenarian.
sentences.cn: 离开莫斯科之前，普京在克里姆林宫主办了一次小规模的宴会，宴会后有一场爵士乐演出，音乐家从十几岁到八十多岁都有。

sentences.en: Marius on that barricade after the octogenarian was the vision of the young revolution after the apparition of the old.
sentences.cn: 马吕斯继那八十岁老人之后，屹立在街垒上，这是继老革命而起的新生革命的形象。

sentences.en: She is a very active octogenarian.
sentences.cn: 她已经是八旬老人了，还很精神。

sentences.en: She is very active for an octogenarian.
sentences.cn: 她已经是八旬老人了,还很精神.

trans.tran_cn: 八十岁的, 八十多岁的
